location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter reports that a cargo boat conveying supplies to the Country Ship Duncanhas encountered a violent gale, that four out of the eight men that were on board are missing, and that the bales of gum armonial [gum ammoniac] it was carrying were washed overboard.
